aliases: the Agent of a Thousand Faces
biography.firstAppearance: Captain America Comics #1 (1941), (modern) Tales of Suspense #66 (1965)

connections.groupAffiliation: Special operative in the government of Germany's Third Reich, former leader of most currently active Nazi subversives throughout the world, former ally of THEM and A.I.M., former leader of the Nevada-based fragment of Hydra, leader of the People's Militia
connections.relatives: Hermann Shmidt (father, deceased), Martha Shmidt (mother, deceased), Sinthea Shmidt (Mother Superior/Sin, daughter)
